üö© Untrusted Context Trap: Indirect Injection 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/rag_fidelity.p
y:)
   retrieved data from external sources (RAG/Web) is being fed to the LLM without 
sanitization.
Vulnerability: Indirect Prompt Injection occurs when a malicious website or document 
'hijacks' the agent via retrieval.
RECOMMENDATION: Implement **Delimited Context** or a 'Safety Critic' turn to verify the 
retrieval payload.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Prevents 3rd-party data from overtaking the agent's system 
instructions.
ACTION: 
/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/rag_fidelity.py

'hijacks' the agent via retrieval.
RECOMMENDATION: Implement **Delimited Context** or a 'Safety Critic' turn to verify the 
retrieval payload.
üö© Architectural Mismatch: RAG for Math 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/rag_fidelity.p
y:)
   Detected mathematical intent being processed via a RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) 
pipeline. RAG is designed for semantic search, not arithmetic accuracy over raw text.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: [MASTER ARCHITECT RECOMMENDATION]: Pivot to an **NL2SQL** pattern or a
**Code Interpreter** tool. These provide 100% deterministic accuracy for calculations, 
whereas LLMs over RAG can only 'approximate' sums.

not arithmetic accuracy over raw text.

   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: System prompts alone are susceptible to jailbreaking. Programmatic

   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Hidden reasoning leads to user distrust. Explainability is a key

üö© Multi-Agent Debate (MAD) & Consensus 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/rag_fidelity.p
y:)
   For high-stakes reasoning, move beyond single-shot ReAct. Implement: 1) Multi-Agent 
Debate: One agent proposes, another critiques. 2) Tree-of-Thoughts (ToT): Explore multiple 
reasoning paths. 3) Self-Reflexion: Agent audits its own output before transmission.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Single-agent loops are prone to hallucinations. Adversarial consensus 
between specialized 'Reviewer' agents significantly increases reliability.
ACTION: 
/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/rag_fidelity.py
:1 | Multi-Agent Debate (MAD) & Consensus | For high-stakes reasoning, move beyond 
single-shot ReAct. Implement: 1) Multi-Agent Debate: One agent proposes, another critiques.
2) Tree-of-Thoughts (ToT): Explore multiple reasoning paths. 3) Self-Reflexion: Agent 
audits its own output before transmission.
üö© Indirect Prompt Injection (RAG Hardening) 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/rag_fidelity.p
y:)
   Protect the RAG pipeline. Implement: 1) Input Sanitization for 'Malicious Fragments' in 
fetched docs. 2) 'Strict Context' prompts that forbid following instructions found in 
retrieved data. 3) Dual LLM verification (Small model scans retrieval context before the 
Large model sees it).
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: RAG systems are vulnerable to 'Indirect' injections where an attacker 
poisons a document to highjack the agent's logic during retrieval.
ACTION: 
/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/rag_fidelity.py
:1 | Indirect Prompt Injection (RAG Hardening) | Protect the RAG pipeline. Implement: 1) 
Input Sanitization for 'Malicious Fragments' in fetched docs. 2) 'Strict Context' prompts 
that forbid following instructions found in retrieved data. 3) Dual LLM verification (Small
model scans retrieval context before the Large model sees it).

y:)
   Adopt the LlamaIndex Workflow (v0.14+) for event-driven agentic logic. This replaces 
rigid linear chains with a dynamic state-based event loop that is more resilient to complex
user intents.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Event-driven workflows provide superior flexibility and error recovery

   Detected retrieval execution on every turn without conditional logic.

RECOMMENDATION: Pivot to **Agentic/Active RAG** (retrieve only when needed).
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Reduces context window waste and improves reasoning focus.

üö© Legacy REST vs MCP 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/maturity.py:)

Microsoft (Agent Kit) are converging on MCP for standardized tool/resource governance.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Standardized protocols reduce integration debt and enable multi-agent 
interoperability without custom bridge logic.
ACTION:

üö© Excessive Agency & Privilege (OWASP LLM06) 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/maturity.py:)
   Audit tool permissions against MITRE ATLAS 'Excessive Agency'. Implement: 1) Granular 
IAM for tool execution. 2) Human-In-The-Loop (HITL) for destructive actions (Delete/Write).
3) Sandbox isolation for Python execution.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Agents with broad tool access are high-value targets. Restricting 
agency to the 'Least Privilege' required for the task is critical for safety.
ACTION: 
/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/maturity.py:1 |
Excessive Agency & Privilege (OWASP LLM06) | Audit tool permissions against MITRE ATLAS 
'Excessive Agency'. Implement: 1) Granular IAM for tool execution. 2) Human-In-The-Loop 
(HITL) for destructive actions (Delete/Write). 3) Sandbox isolation for Python execution.

Large model sees it).
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: RAG systems are vulnerable to 'Indirect' injections where an attacker 
poisons a document to highjack the agent's logic during retrieval.
ACTION: 
/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/maturity.py:1 |
Indirect Prompt Injection (RAG Hardening) | Protect the RAG pipeline. Implement: 1) Input 
Sanitization for 'Malicious Fragments' in fetched docs. 2) 'Strict Context' prompts that 
forbid following instructions found in retrieved data. 3) Dual LLM verification (Small 
model scans retrieval context before the Large model sees it).

   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: [MASTER ARCHITECT RECOMMENDATION]: Pivot to an **NL2SQL** pattern or a
**Code Interpreter** tool. These provide 100% deterministic accuracy for calculations, 
whereas LLMs over RAG can only 'approximate' sums.

üö© Payload Splitting (Context Fragmentation) 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/sre_a2a.py:)
   Monitor for Payload Splitting attacks where malicious fragments are combined over 
multiple turns. Mitigation: 1) Implement sliding window verification. 2) Use 'DARE 
Prompting' (Determine Appropriate Response) to re-evaluate intent at every turn.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Attackers can bypass single-turn filters by splitting a payload across
multiple turns. Continuous monitoring of context assembly is required.
ACTION: 
/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/sre_a2a.py:1 | 
Payload Splitting (Context Fragmentation) | Monitor for Payload Splitting attacks where 
malicious fragments are combined over multiple turns. Mitigation: 1) Implement sliding 
window verification. 2) Use 'DARE Prompting' (Determine Appropriate Response) to 
re-evaluate intent at every turn.
üö© Agentic Observability (Golden Signals) 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/sre_a2a.py:)
   Monitor the Agentic Trinity: 1) Reasoning Trace (LangSmith/AgentOps). 2) Time to First 
Token (TTFT). 3) Cost per Intent. Microsoft Agent Kit recommends 'Trace-based Debugging' 
for multi-agent loops.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Traditional service metrics (CPU/RAM) aren't enough for agents. 
Perceived intelligence is tied to TTFT and reasoning path transparency.
ACTION: 
/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/sre_a2a.py:1 | 
Agentic Observability (Golden Signals) | Monitor the Agentic Trinity: 1) Reasoning Trace 
(LangSmith/AgentOps). 2) Time to First Token (TTFT). 3) Cost per Intent. Microsoft Agent 
Kit recommends 'Trace-based Debugging' for multi-agent loops.
üö© Excessive Agency & Privilege (OWASP LLM06) 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/sre_a2a.py:)
   Audit tool permissions against MITRE ATLAS 'Excessive Agency'. Implement: 1) Granular 
IAM for tool execution. 2) Human-In-The-Loop (HITL) for destructive actions (Delete/Write).
3) Sandbox isolation for Python execution.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Agents with broad tool access are high-value targets. Restricting 
agency to the 'Least Privilege' required for the task is critical for safety.
ACTION: 
/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/sre_a2a.py:1 | 
Excessive Agency & Privilege (OWASP LLM06) | Audit tool permissions against MITRE ATLAS 
'Excessive Agency'. Implement: 1) Granular IAM for tool execution. 2) Human-In-The-Loop 
(HITL) for destructive actions (Delete/Write). 3) Sandbox isolation for Python execution.
üö© Explainable Reasoning (HAX Guideline 11) 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/sre_a2a.py:)
   Ensure users understand 'Why' the agent took an action. Implementation: 1) Microsoft 
HAX: Make clear 'Why' the system did what it did. 2) Google PAIR: Show the source for RAG 
claims. 3) UI: Collapse reasoning traces behind 'View Steps' toggles.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Hidden reasoning leads to user distrust. Explainability is a key 
component of the 5th Golden Signal (User Perception of Intelligence).
ACTION: 
/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/sre_a2a.py:1 | 
Explainable Reasoning (HAX Guideline 11) | Ensure users understand 'Why' the agent took an 
action. Implementation: 1) Microsoft HAX: Make clear 'Why' the system did what it did. 2) 
Google PAIR: Show the source for RAG claims. 3) UI: Collapse reasoning traces behind 'View 
Steps' toggles.
üö© Multi-Agent Debate (MAD) & Consensus 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/sre_a2a.py:)
   For high-stakes reasoning, move beyond single-shot ReAct. Implement: 1) Multi-Agent 
Debate: One agent proposes, another critiques. 2) Tree-of-Thoughts (ToT): Explore multiple 
reasoning paths. 3) Self-Reflexion: Agent audits its own output before transmission.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Single-agent loops are prone to hallucinations. Adversarial consensus 
between specialized 'Reviewer' agents significantly increases reliability.
ACTION: 
/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/sre_a2a.py:1 | 
Multi-Agent Debate (MAD) & Consensus | For high-stakes reasoning, move beyond single-shot 
ReAct. Implement: 1) Multi-Agent Debate: One agent proposes, another critiques. 2) 
Tree-of-Thoughts (ToT): Explore multiple reasoning paths. 3) Self-Reflexion: Agent audits 
its own output before transmission.
üö© Indirect Prompt Injection (RAG Hardening) 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/sre_a2a.py:)
   Protect the RAG pipeline. Implement: 1) Input Sanitization for 'Malicious Fragments' in 
fetched docs. 2) 'Strict Context' prompts that forbid following instructions found in 
retrieved data. 3) Dual LLM verification (Small model scans retrieval context before the 
Large model sees it).
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: RAG systems are vulnerable to 'Indirect' injections where an attacker 
poisons a document to highjack the agent's logic during retrieval.
ACTION: 
/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/sre_a2a.py:1 | 
Indirect Prompt Injection (RAG Hardening) | Protect the RAG pipeline. Implement: 1) Input 
Sanitization for 'Malicious Fragments' in fetched docs. 2) 'Strict Context' prompts that 
forbid following instructions found in retrieved data. 3) Dual LLM verification (Small 
model scans retrieval context before the Large model sees it).

   Adopt Universal Context Protocol (UCP) for standardized cross-agent memory handshakes.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Detected ad-hoc memory passing. UCP reduces context-fragmentation and 
allows memory to persist across framework transitions.

üö© LlamaIndex Workflows (Event-Driven Reasoning) 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/sre_a2a.py:)
   Adopt the LlamaIndex Workflow (v0.14+) for event-driven agentic logic. This replaces 
rigid linear chains with a dynamic state-based event loop that is more resilient to complex
user intents.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Event-driven workflows provide superior flexibility and error recovery
compared to standard synchronous chains.
ACTION: 
/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/sre_a2a.py:1 |

event-driven agentic logic. This replaces rigid linear chains with a dynamic state-based 
event loop that is more resilient to complex user intents.
üö© Recursive Self-Improvement (Self-Reflexion Loops) 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/sre_a2a.py:)
   Integrate Recursive Self-Reflexion. Research from ArXiv (cs.AI) proves that agents 
auditing their own reasoning paths reduce hallucination by 40%.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Ad-hoc loops lack a termination-of-reasoning proof. Standardizing on 
Reflexion increases deterministic reliability.
ACTION: 
/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/sre_a2a.py:1 | 
Recursive Self-Improvement (Self-Reflexion Loops) | Integrate Recursive Self-Reflexion. 
Research from ArXiv (cs.AI) proves that agents auditing their own reasoning paths reduce 
hallucination by 40%.
üö© Architectural Mismatch: RAG for Math 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/sre_a2a.py:)
   Detected mathematical intent being processed via RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation). 
Pivot to an **NL2SQL** pattern or a **Code Interpreter** tool. These provide deterministic 
accuracy for calculations, whereas LLMs over RAG only approximate.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: RAG is designed for semantic search, not arithmetic accuracy. 
Mathematical operations require structured data tools or precise execution environments.
ACTION: 
/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/sre_a2a.py:1 | 
Architectural Mismatch: RAG for Math | Detected mathematical intent being processed via RAG
(Retrieval-Augmented Generation). Pivot to an **NL2SQL** pattern or a **Code Interpreter** 
tool. These provide deterministic accuracy for calculations, whereas LLMs over RAG only 
approximate.
üö© Passive Retrieval: Context Drowning 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/sre_a2a.py:)
   Detected retrieval execution on every turn without conditional logic.
FinOps Waste: Fetching documents when the model already 'knows' the answer burns context 
and cost.
RECOMMENDATION: Pivot to **Agentic/Active RAG** (retrieve only when needed).
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Reduces context window waste and improves reasoning focus.
ACTION: 
/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/sre_a2a.py:1 | 
Passive Retrieval: Context Drowning | Detected retrieval execution on every turn without 
conditional logic.
FinOps Waste: Fetching documents when the model already 'knows' the answer burns context 
and cost.
RECOMMENDATION: Pivot to **Agentic/Active RAG** (retrieve only when needed).
üö© Economic Inefficiency: Model Over-Privilege 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/ops/auditors/base.py:)
   Using a High-Tier model (e.g., GPT-4o/Pro) for deterministic ETL or parsing tasks.
Strategic Move: This task can be handled by a 'Flash' or 'Mini' tier model at 1/10th the 
cost.
RECOMMENDATION: Pivot to **Gemini 2.0 Flash** or **GPT-4o-mini** for metadata tasks.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Immediate 90%+ reduction in inference billing.
ACTION:

2) GCP: Application Mimetype (application/json) enforcement. 3) LangGraph: Pydantic-based 
state validation.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Markdown-wrapped JSON is brittle. API-level schema enforcement ensures
stable agent-to-tool and agent-to-brain handshakes.

Consider memory-optimized nodes (>4GB).
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Maximizes Token Throughput by preventing memory-swapping during

API). 3) Persona: Tone of Voice controllers.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: System prompts alone are susceptible to jailbreaking. Programmatic 
filters provide a deterministic safety net that cannot be 'ignored' by the model.

üö© Indirect Prompt Injection (RAG Hardening) 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/red_team.py:)
   Protect the RAG pipeline. Implement: 1) Input Sanitization for 'Malicious Fragments' in 
fetched docs. 2) 'Strict Context' prompts that forbid following instructions found in 
retrieved data. 3) Dual LLM verification (Small model scans retrieval context before the 
Large model sees it).
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: RAG systems are vulnerable to 'Indirect' injections where an attacker 
poisons a document to highjack the agent's logic during retrieval.
ACTION: /Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/red_team.py:1 |
Indirect Prompt Injection (RAG Hardening) | Protect the RAG pipeline. Implement: 1) Input 
Sanitization for 'Malicious Fragments' in fetched docs. 2) 'Strict Context' prompts that 
forbid following instructions found in retrieved data. 3) Dual LLM verification (Small 
model scans retrieval context before the Large model sees it).
üö© Mental Model Discovery (HAX Guideline 01) 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/red_team.py:)
   Don't leave users guessing. Implementation: 1) HAX: Make clear what the system can do. 
2) UI: Provide 'Capability Cards' or proactive tool suggestions. 3) Discovery: Show sample 
queries on empty state.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: User frustration often stems from 'Mental Model Mismatch' (expecting 
the agent to do things it cannot). Proactive disclosure of capabilities resolves this.
ACTION: /Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/red_team.py:1 |
Mental Model Discovery (HAX Guideline 01) | Don't leave users guessing. Implementation: 1) 
HAX: Make clear what the system can do. 2) UI: Provide 'Capability Cards' or proactive tool
suggestions. 3) Discovery: Show sample queries on empty state.
üö© Architectural Mismatch: RAG for Math 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/red_team.py:)
   Detected mathematical intent being processed via RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation). 
Pivot to an **NL2SQL** pattern or a **Code Interpreter** tool. These provide deterministic 
accuracy for calculations, whereas LLMs over RAG only approximate.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: RAG is designed for semantic search, not arithmetic accuracy. 
Mathematical operations require structured data tools or precise execution environments.
ACTION: /Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/red_team.py:1 |
Architectural Mismatch: RAG for Math | Detected mathematical intent being processed via RAG
(Retrieval-Augmented Generation). Pivot to an **NL2SQL** pattern or a **Code Interpreter** 
tool. These provide deterministic accuracy for calculations, whereas LLMs over RAG only 
approximate.
üö© Token Amnesia: Manual Memory Management 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/red_team.py:)
   Detected manual chat history management (list appending) without persistent session 
state.
Structural Risk: Manual history leads to context truncation issues and 'Token Amnesia' 
across restarts.
RECOMMENDATION: Pivot to **Persistent Memory (Zep, MemGPT, or Redis)** for long-term 
reasoning.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Ensures conversational continuity and long-term user context.
ACTION: /Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/red_team.py:1 |
Token Amnesia: Manual Memory Management | Detected manual chat history management (list 
appending) without persistent session state.
Structural Risk: Manual history leads to context truncation issues and 'Token Amnesia' 
across restarts.
RECOMMENDATION: Pivot to **Persistent Memory (Zep, MemGPT, or Redis)** for long-term 
reasoning.
üö© Paradigm Drift: RAG for Math 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/red_team.py:)
   Detected arithmetic intent combined with semantic retrieval.
Structural Failure: RAG is for text retrieval, not precise mathematical aggregations.
RECOMMENDATION: Pivot to **Code Interpreter** or **SQL Agent**.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Eliminates reasoning drift in analytical operations.
ACTION: /Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/red_team.py:1 |
Paradigm Drift: RAG for Math | Detected arithmetic intent combined with semantic retrieval.
Structural Failure: RAG is for text retrieval, not precise mathematical aggregations.
RECOMMENDATION: Pivot to **Code Interpreter** or **SQL Agent**.
üö© Latency Trap: Brute-Force Local Search 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/red_team.py:)
   Detected local filesystem traversal combined with LLM querying.
Strategic Failure: Scalability will fail at enterprise volumes.
RECOMMENDATION: Pivot to **Vector RAG (Pinecone/Chroma)**.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Enables sub-second discovery over enterprise datasets.
ACTION: /Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/red_team.py:1 |
Latency Trap: Brute-Force Local Search | Detected local filesystem traversal combined with 
LLM querying.
Strategic Failure: Scalability will fail at enterprise volumes.
RECOMMENDATION: Pivot to **Vector RAG (Pinecone/Chroma)**.
üö© Looming Latency: Blocking Inference 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/red_team.py:)
   Detected non-streaming generation for long-form content.
Strategic UX Risk: Long-wait times without feedback lead to churn.
RECOMMENDATION: Pivot to **A2UI Streaming Protocol**.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Improves perceived latency and retention.
ACTION: /Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/red_team.py:1 |

üö© Untrusted Context Trap: Indirect Injection 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/quality_climber.py:)
   retrieved data from external sources (RAG/Web) is being fed to the LLM without 
sanitization.
Vulnerability: Indirect Prompt Injection occurs when a malicious website or document 
'hijacks' the agent via retrieval.
RECOMMENDATION: Implement **Delimited Context** or a 'Safety Critic' turn to verify the 
retrieval payload.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Prevents 3rd-party data from overtaking the agent's system 
instructions.
ACTION: 
/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/quality_climber.py:1 | 
Untrusted Context Trap: Indirect Injection | retrieved data from external sources (RAG/Web)
is being fed to the LLM without sanitization.
Vulnerability: Indirect Prompt Injection occurs when a malicious website or document 
'hijacks' the agent via retrieval.
RECOMMENDATION: Implement **Delimited Context** or a 'Safety Critic' turn to verify the 
retrieval payload.
üö© Architectural Mismatch: RAG for Math 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/quality_climber.py:)
   Detected mathematical intent being processed via a RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) 
pipeline. RAG is designed for semantic search, not arithmetic accuracy over raw text.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: [MASTER ARCHITECT RECOMMENDATION]: Pivot to an **NL2SQL** pattern or a
**Code Interpreter** tool. These provide 100% deterministic accuracy for calculations, 
whereas LLMs over RAG can only 'approximate' sums.
ACTION:

RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) pipeline. RAG is designed for semantic search, not 
arithmetic accuracy over raw text.
üö© Economic Risk: Inference Loop Detected 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/quality_climber.py:44)
   Detected LLM reasoning calls inside a standard Python loop.
Strategic Waste: Linear loops scale token costs indefinitely. 
LOOP DETECTED: Projected TCO: $25.00 (Aggressive multiplier).
RECOMMENDATION: Pivot to **Batch Inference** or a **Map-Reduce** pattern.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Reduces per-token overhead by up to 50% via batch discounts.
ACTION: 
/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/quality_climber.py:44 |
Economic Risk: Inference Loop Detected | Detected LLM reasoning calls inside a standard 
Python loop.
Strategic Waste: Linear loops scale token costs indefinitely. 
LOOP DETECTED: Projected TCO: $25.00 (Aggressive multiplier).
RECOMMENDATION: Pivot to **Batch Inference** or a **Map-Reduce** pattern.

activation.

üö© Orchestration Pattern Selection 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/quality_climber.py:)
   When evaluating orchestration, consider: 1) LangGraph: Use for complex cyclic state 
machines with persistence (checkpoints). 2) CrewAI: Best for role-based hierarchical 
collaboration. 3) Anthropic: Prefer 'Workflows over Agents' for high-predictability tasks.

[CONGENIAL RESEARCH SIGNAL]: Research Signal (ArXiv): Integrate Recursive Self-Reflexion to
reduce hallucination by 40%. (Source: ArXiv Intelligence Sync (Feb 2026))
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Detected custom loop logic. Standardized frameworks provide superior 
state management and built-in 'Human-in-the-Loop' (HITL) pause points.
ACTION:

Use for complex cyclic state machines with persistence (checkpoints). 2) CrewAI: Best for 
role-based hierarchical collaboration. 3) Anthropic: Prefer 'Workflows over Agents' for 
high-predictability tasks.

üö© Payload Splitting (Context Fragmentation) 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/quality_climber.py:)
   Monitor for Payload Splitting attacks where malicious fragments are combined over 
multiple turns. Mitigation: 1) Implement sliding window verification. 2) Use 'DARE 
Prompting' (Determine Appropriate Response) to re-evaluate intent at every turn.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Attackers can bypass single-turn filters by splitting a payload across
multiple turns. Continuous monitoring of context assembly is required.
ACTION: 
/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/quality_climber.py:1 | 
Payload Splitting (Context Fragmentation) | Monitor for Payload Splitting attacks where 
malicious fragments are combined over multiple turns. Mitigation: 1) Implement sliding 
window verification. 2) Use 'DARE Prompting' (Determine Appropriate Response) to 
re-evaluate intent at every turn.
üö© Agentic Observability (Golden Signals) 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/quality_climber.py:)
   Monitor the Agentic Trinity: 1) Reasoning Trace (LangSmith/AgentOps). 2) Time to First 
Token (TTFT). 3) Cost per Intent. Microsoft Agent Kit recommends 'Trace-based Debugging' 
for multi-agent loops.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Traditional service metrics (CPU/RAM) aren't enough for agents. 
Perceived intelligence is tied to TTFT and reasoning path transparency.
ACTION: 
/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/quality_climber.py:1 |

(LangSmith/AgentOps). 2) Time to First Token (TTFT). 3) Cost per Intent. Microsoft Agent 
Kit recommends 'Trace-based Debugging' for multi-agent loops.
üö© Explainable Reasoning (HAX Guideline 11) 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/quality_climber.py:)
   Ensure users understand 'Why' the agent took an action. Implementation: 1) Microsoft 
HAX: Make clear 'Why' the system did what it did. 2) Google PAIR: Show the source for RAG 
claims. 3) UI: Collapse reasoning traces behind 'View Steps' toggles.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Hidden reasoning leads to user distrust. Explainability is a key 
component of the 5th Golden Signal (User Perception of Intelligence).
ACTION:

Google PAIR: Show the source for RAG claims. 3) UI: Collapse reasoning traces behind 'View 
Steps' toggles.

üö© Reflection Blindness: Brittle Intelligence 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/quality_climber.py:)
   Detected high-stakes reasoning (Code/Legal/Finance) without a visible Reflection or 
Self-Correction loop.
Structural Fragility: Single-pass reasoning on complex tasks has high failure rates.
RECOMMENDATION: Implement a **Reflection Loop** or a Multi-Turn **Critic-Actor** pattern.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Significantly reduces reasoning hallucinations and logic errors.
ACTION: 
/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/quality_climber.py:1 |

(Code/Legal/Finance) without a visible Reflection or Self-Correction loop.

RECOMMENDATION: Implement a **Reflection Loop** or a Multi-Turn **Critic-Actor** pattern.

üö© Legacy REST vs MCP 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/load_test.py:)
   Pivot to Model Context Protocol (MCP) for tool discovery. OpenAI, Anthropic, and 
Microsoft (Agent Kit) are converging on MCP for standardized tool/resource governance.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Standardized protocols reduce integration debt and enable multi-agent 
interoperability without custom bridge logic.
ACTION: /Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/load_test.py:1 
| Legacy REST vs MCP | Pivot to Model Context Protocol (MCP) for tool discovery. OpenAI, 
Anthropic, and Microsoft (Agent Kit) are converging on MCP for standardized tool/resource 
governance.
üö© Agentic Observability (Golden Signals) 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/load_test.py:)
   Monitor the Agentic Trinity: 1) Reasoning Trace (LangSmith/AgentOps). 2) Time to First 
Token (TTFT). 3) Cost per Intent. Microsoft Agent Kit recommends 'Trace-based Debugging' 
for multi-agent loops.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Traditional service metrics (CPU/RAM) aren't enough for agents. 
Perceived intelligence is tied to TTFT and reasoning path transparency.
ACTION: /Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/load_test.py:1 
| Agentic Observability (Golden Signals) | Monitor the Agentic Trinity: 1) Reasoning Trace 
(LangSmith/AgentOps). 2) Time to First Token (TTFT). 3) Cost per Intent. Microsoft Agent 
Kit recommends 'Trace-based Debugging' for multi-agent loops.
üö© Indirect Prompt Injection (RAG Hardening) 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/load_test.py:)
   Protect the RAG pipeline. Implement: 1) Input Sanitization for 'Malicious Fragments' in 
fetched docs. 2) 'Strict Context' prompts that forbid following instructions found in 
retrieved data. 3) Dual LLM verification (Small model scans retrieval context before the 
Large model sees it).
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: RAG systems are vulnerable to 'Indirect' injections where an attacker 
poisons a document to highjack the agent's logic during retrieval.
ACTION: /Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/load_test.py:1 
| Indirect Prompt Injection (RAG Hardening) | Protect the RAG pipeline. Implement: 1) Input
Sanitization for 'Malicious Fragments' in fetched docs. 2) 'Strict Context' prompts that 
forbid following instructions found in retrieved data. 3) Dual LLM verification (Small 
model scans retrieval context before the Large model sees it).
üö© Mental Model Discovery (HAX Guideline 01) 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/load_test.py:)
   Don't leave users guessing. Implementation: 1) HAX: Make clear what the system can do. 
2) UI: Provide 'Capability Cards' or proactive tool suggestions. 3) Discovery: Show sample 
queries on empty state.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: User frustration often stems from 'Mental Model Mismatch' (expecting 
the agent to do things it cannot). Proactive disclosure of capabilities resolves this.
ACTION: /Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/load_test.py:1 
| Mental Model Discovery (HAX Guideline 01) | Don't leave users guessing. Implementation: 
1) HAX: Make clear what the system can do. 2) UI: Provide 'Capability Cards' or proactive 
tool suggestions. 3) Discovery: Show sample queries on empty state.
üö© Architectural Mismatch: RAG for Math 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/load_test.py:)
   Detected mathematical intent being processed via RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation). 
Pivot to an **NL2SQL** pattern or a **Code Interpreter** tool. These provide deterministic 
accuracy for calculations, whereas LLMs over RAG only approximate.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: RAG is designed for semantic search, not arithmetic accuracy. 
Mathematical operations require structured data tools or precise execution environments.
ACTION: /Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/load_test.py:1 
| Architectural Mismatch: RAG for Math | Detected mathematical intent being processed via 
RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation). Pivot to an **NL2SQL** pattern or a **Code 
Interpreter** tool. These provide deterministic accuracy for calculations, whereas LLMs 
over RAG only approximate.
üö© Reflection Blindness: Brittle Intelligence 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/load_test.py:)
   Detected high-stakes reasoning (Code/Legal/Finance) without a visible Reflection or 
Self-Correction loop.
Structural Fragility: Single-pass reasoning on complex tasks has high failure rates.
RECOMMENDATION: Implement a **Reflection Loop** or a Multi-Turn **Critic-Actor** pattern.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Significantly reduces reasoning hallucinations and logic errors.
ACTION: /Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/load_test.py:1 
| Reflection Blindness: Brittle Intelligence | Detected high-stakes reasoning 
(Code/Legal/Finance) without a visible Reflection or Self-Correction loop.
Structural Fragility: Single-pass reasoning on complex tasks has high failure rates.
RECOMMENDATION: Implement a **Reflection Loop** or a Multi-Turn **Critic-Actor** pattern.

for all system access.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Critical for passing external audits and root-cause analysis.

üö© Economic Inefficiency: Model Over-Privilege 
(/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/aws-apprunner.json:)
   Using a High-Tier model (e.g., GPT-4o/Pro) for deterministic ETL or parsing tasks.
Strategic Move: This task can be handled by a 'Flash' or 'Mini' tier model at 1/10th the 
cost.
RECOMMENDATION: Pivot to **Gemini 2.0 Flash** or **GPT-4o-mini** for metadata tasks.
   ‚öñÔ∏è Strategic ROI: Immediate 90%+ reduction in inference billing.
ACTION: 
/Users/enriq/Documents/git/agent-cockpit/src/agent_ops_cockpit/eval/aws-apprunner.json:1 |

‚ï≠‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ üìê v1.3 AUTONOMOUS ARCHITECT ADR ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚ïÆ
‚îÇ                       üèõÔ∏è Architecture Decision Record (ADR) v1.3                        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ Status: AUTONOMOUS_REVIEW_COMPLETED Score: 100/100                                      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ üåä Impact Waterfall (v1.3)                                                              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Reasoning Delay: 2000ms added to chain (Critical Path).                              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Risk Reduction: 4260% reduction in Potential Failure Points (PFPs) via audit logic.  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Sovereignty Delta: 0/100 - (üö® EXIT_PLAN_REQUIRED).                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ üõ†Ô∏è Summary of Findings                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ SOC2 Control Gap: Missing Transit Logging: Structural logging (logger.info/error)    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    not detected. SOC2 CC6.1 requires audit trails for all system access. (Impact: HIGH) ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Potential Recursive Agent Loop: Detected a self-referencing agent call pattern. Risk ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    of infinite reasoning loops and runaway costs. (Impact: CRITICAL)                    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Proprietary Context Handshake (Non-AP2): Agent is using ad-hoc context passing.      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Adopting UCP (Universal Context) or AP2 (Agent Protocol v2) ensures cross-framework  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    interoperability. (Impact: LOW)                                                      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Missing 5th Golden Signal (TTFT/Tracing): Structural tracing instrumentation         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (OTEL/Cloud Trace) not detected. TTFT is the primary metric for perceived            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    intelligence. (Impact: MEDIUM)                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Indirect Prompt Injection (RAG Hardening): Protect the RAG pipeline. Implement: 1)   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Input Sanitization for 'Malicious Fragments' in fetched docs. 2) 'Strict Context'    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    prompts that forbid following instructions found in retrieved data. 3) Dual LLM      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    verification (Small model scans retrieval context before the Large model sees it).   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (Impact: CRITICAL)                                                                   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ SOC2 Control Gap: Missing Transit Logging: Structural logging (logger.info/error)    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    not detected. SOC2 CC6.1 requires audit trails for all system access. (Impact: HIGH) ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Missing 5th Golden Signal (TTFT/Tracing): Structural tracing instrumentation         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (OTEL/Cloud Trace) not detected. TTFT is the primary metric for perceived            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    intelligence. (Impact: MEDIUM)                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ SOC2 Control Gap: Missing Transit Logging: Structural logging (logger.info/error)    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    not detected. SOC2 CC6.1 requires audit trails for all system access. (Impact: HIGH) ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Proprietary Context Handshake (Non-AP2): Agent is using ad-hoc context passing.      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Adopting UCP (Universal Context) or AP2 (Agent Protocol v2) ensures cross-framework  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    interoperability. (Impact: LOW)                                                      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Missing 5th Golden Signal (TTFT/Tracing): Structural tracing instrumentation         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (OTEL/Cloud Trace) not detected. TTFT is the primary metric for perceived            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    intelligence. (Impact: MEDIUM)                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Indirect Prompt Injection (RAG Hardening): Protect the RAG pipeline. Implement: 1)   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Input Sanitization for 'Malicious Fragments' in fetched docs. 2) 'Strict Context'    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    prompts that forbid following instructions found in retrieved data. 3) Dual LLM      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    verification (Small model scans retrieval context before the Large model sees it).   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (Impact: CRITICAL)                                                                   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ LlamaIndex Workflows (Event-Driven Reasoning): Adopt the LlamaIndex Workflow         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (v0.14+) for event-driven agentic logic. This replaces rigid linear chains with a    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    dynamic state-based event loop that is more resilient to complex user intents.       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (Impact: HIGH)                                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Missing Resiliency Logic: External call 'get' to 'https://agent-cockpit.web.app/...' ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    is not protected by retry logic. (Impact: HIGH)                                      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Architectural Prompt Bloat: Massive static context (>5k chars) detected in system    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    instruction. This risks 'Lost in the Middle' hallucinations. (Impact: MEDIUM)        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Economic Inefficiency: Model Over-Privilege: Using a High-Tier model (e.g.,          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    GPT-4o/Pro) for deterministic ETL or parsing tasks. [bold yellow]Strategic           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Move:[/bold yellow] This task can be handled by a 'Flash' or 'Mini' tier model at    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    1/10th the cost. [bold green]RECOMMENDATION:[/bold green] Pivot to Gemini 2.0 Flash  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    or GPT-4o-mini for metadata tasks. (Impact: MEDIUM)                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ SOC2 Control Gap: Missing Transit Logging: Structural logging (logger.info/error)    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    not detected. SOC2 CC6.1 requires audit trails for all system access. (Impact: HIGH) ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Potential Recursive Agent Loop: Detected a self-referencing agent call pattern. Risk ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    of infinite reasoning loops and runaway costs. (Impact: CRITICAL)                    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Time-to-Reasoning (TTR) Risk: Cloud Run detected. MISSING startup_cpu_boost. High    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    risk of 10s+ cold starts. A slow TTR makes the agent's first response 'Dead on       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Arrival' for users. (Impact: HIGH)                                                   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Short-Term Memory (STM) at Risk: Agent is storing session state in local pod memory  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (dictionaries). A GKE restart or Cloud Run scale-down wipes the agent's brain.       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (Impact: HIGH)                                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Missing 5th Golden Signal (TTFT/Tracing): Structural tracing instrumentation         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (OTEL/Cloud Trace) not detected. TTFT is the primary metric for perceived            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    intelligence. (Impact: MEDIUM)                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Sub-Optimal Resource Profile: LLM workloads are Memory-Bound (KV-Cache). Low-memory  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    instances degrade reasoning speed. Consider memory-optimized nodes (>4GB). (Impact:  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    LOW)                                                                                 ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Legacy REST vs MCP: Pivot to Model Context Protocol (MCP) for tool discovery.        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    OpenAI, Anthropic, and Microsoft (Agent Kit) are converging on MCP for standardized  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    tool/resource governance. (Impact: HIGH)                                             ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Enterprise Identity (Identity Sprawl): Move beyond static keys. Implement: 1) GCP:   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Workload Identity Federation. 2) AWS: Private VPC Endpoints + IAM Role-based access. ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    3) Azure: Managed Identities for all tool interactions. (Impact: CRITICAL)           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Orchestration Pattern Selection: When evaluating orchestration, consider: 1)         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    LangGraph: Use for complex cyclic state machines with persistence (checkpoints). 2)  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    CrewAI: Best for role-based hierarchical collaboration. 3) Anthropic: Prefer         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    'Workflows over Agents' for high-predictability tasks.                               ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ [CONGENIAL RESEARCH SIGNAL]: Research Signal (ArXiv): Integrate Recursive               ‚îÇ
‚îÇ Self-Reflexion to reduce hallucination by 40%. (Source: ArXiv Intelligence Sync (Feb    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ 2026)) (Impact: MEDIUM)                                                                 ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Agentic Observability (Golden Signals): Monitor the Agentic Trinity: 1) Reasoning    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Trace (LangSmith/AgentOps). 2) Time to First Token (TTFT). 3) Cost per Intent.       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Microsoft Agent Kit recommends 'Trace-based Debugging' for multi-agent loops.        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (Impact: MEDIUM)                                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Explainable Reasoning (HAX Guideline 11): Ensure users understand 'Why' the agent    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    took an action. Implementation: 1) Microsoft HAX: Make clear 'Why' the system did    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    what it did. 2) Google PAIR: Show the source for RAG claims. 3) UI: Collapse         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    reasoning traces behind 'View Steps' toggles. (Impact: HIGH)                         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Indirect Prompt Injection (RAG Hardening): Protect the RAG pipeline. Implement: 1)   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Input Sanitization for 'Malicious Fragments' in fetched docs. 2) 'Strict Context'    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    prompts that forbid following instructions found in retrieved data. 3) Dual LLM      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    verification (Small model scans retrieval context before the Large model sees it).   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (Impact: CRITICAL)                                                                   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ LlamaIndex Workflows (Event-Driven Reasoning): Adopt the LlamaIndex Workflow         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (v0.14+) for event-driven agentic logic. This replaces rigid linear chains with a    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    dynamic state-based event loop that is more resilient to complex user intents.       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (Impact: HIGH)                                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Recursive Self-Improvement (Self-Reflexion Loops): Integrate Recursive               ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Self-Reflexion. Research from ArXiv (cs.AI) proves that agents auditing their own    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    reasoning paths reduce hallucination by 40%. (Impact: CRITICAL)                      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Architectural Mismatch: RAG for Math: Detected mathematical intent being processed   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    via RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation). Pivot to an NL2SQL pattern or a Code       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Interpreter tool. These provide deterministic accuracy for calculations, whereas     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    LLMs over RAG only approximate. (Impact: HIGH)                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Reflection Blindness: Brittle Intelligence: Detected high-stakes reasoning           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (Code/Legal/Finance) without a visible Reflection or Self-Correction loop. [bold     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    red]Structural Fragility:[/bold red] Single-pass reasoning on complex tasks has high ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    failure rates. [bold green]RECOMMENDATION:[/bold green] Implement a Reflection Loop  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    or a Multi-Turn Critic-Actor pattern. (Impact: HIGH (Accuracy))                      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Architectural Prompt Bloat: Massive static context (>5k chars) detected in system    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    instruction. This risks 'Lost in the Middle' hallucinations. (Impact: MEDIUM)        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Architectural Mismatch: RAG for Math: Detected mathematical intent being processed   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    via a RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) pipeline. RAG is designed for semantic    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    search, not arithmetic accuracy over raw text. (Impact: HIGH)                        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Economic Inefficiency: Model Over-Privilege: Using a High-Tier model (e.g.,          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    GPT-4o/Pro) for deterministic ETL or parsing tasks. [bold yellow]Strategic           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Move:[/bold yellow] This task can be handled by a 'Flash' or 'Mini' tier model at    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    1/10th the cost. [bold green]RECOMMENDATION:[/bold green] Pivot to Gemini 2.0 Flash  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    or GPT-4o-mini for metadata tasks. (Impact: MEDIUM)                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Potential Recursive Agent Loop: Detected a self-referencing agent call pattern. Risk ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    of infinite reasoning loops and runaway costs. (Impact: CRITICAL)                    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Short-Term Memory (STM) at Risk: Agent is storing session state in local pod memory  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (dictionaries). A GKE restart or Cloud Run scale-down wipes the agent's brain.       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (Impact: HIGH)                                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Vector Store Evolution (Chroma DB): For enterprise scaling, evaluate: 1) Google      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Cloud: Amazon Bedrock Search for handled grounding. 2) AWS: Amazon Bedrock Knowledge ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Bases. 3) General: BigQuery Vector Search for high-scale analytical joins. (Impact:  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    HIGH)                                                                                ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Orchestration Pattern Selection: When evaluating orchestration, consider: 1)         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    LangGraph: Use for complex cyclic state machines with persistence (checkpoints). 2)  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    CrewAI: Best for role-based hierarchical collaboration. 3) Anthropic: Prefer         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    'Workflows over Agents' for high-predictability tasks.                               ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ [CONGENIAL RESEARCH SIGNAL]: Research Signal (ArXiv): Integrate Recursive               ‚îÇ
‚îÇ Self-Reflexion to reduce hallucination by 40%. (Source: ArXiv Intelligence Sync (Feb    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ 2026)) (Impact: MEDIUM)                                                                 ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Payload Splitting (Context Fragmentation): Monitor for Payload Splitting attacks     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    where malicious fragments are combined over multiple turns. Mitigation: 1) Implement ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    sliding window verification. 2) Use 'DARE Prompting' (Determine Appropriate          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Response) to re-evaluate intent at every turn. (Impact: HIGH)                        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Missing Safety Classifiers: Supplement prompt-based safety with programmatic layers: ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    1) Input Level: ShieldGemma or LLM Guard. 2) Output Level: Sentiment Analysis and    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Category Checks (GCP Natural Language API). 3) Persona: Tone of Voice controllers.   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (Impact: HIGH)                                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Excessive Agency & Privilege (OWASP LLM06): Audit tool permissions against MITRE     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    ATLAS 'Excessive Agency'. Implement: 1) Granular IAM for tool execution. 2)          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Human-In-The-Loop (HITL) for destructive actions (Delete/Write). 3) Sandbox          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    isolation for Python execution. (Impact: CRITICAL)                                   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Explainable Reasoning (HAX Guideline 11): Ensure users understand 'Why' the agent    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    took an action. Implementation: 1) Microsoft HAX: Make clear 'Why' the system did    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    what it did. 2) Google PAIR: Show the source for RAG claims. 3) UI: Collapse         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    reasoning traces behind 'View Steps' toggles. (Impact: HIGH)                         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Multi-Agent Debate (MAD) & Consensus: For high-stakes reasoning, move beyond         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    single-shot ReAct. Implement: 1) Multi-Agent Debate: One agent proposes, another     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    critiques. 2) Tree-of-Thoughts (ToT): Explore multiple reasoning paths. 3)           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Self-Reflexion: Agent audits its own output before transmission. (Impact: HIGH)      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Indirect Prompt Injection (RAG Hardening): Protect the RAG pipeline. Implement: 1)   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Input Sanitization for 'Malicious Fragments' in fetched docs. 2) 'Strict Context'    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    prompts that forbid following instructions found in retrieved data. 3) Dual LLM      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    verification (Small model scans retrieval context before the Large model sees it).   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (Impact: CRITICAL)                                                                   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ LlamaIndex Workflows (Event-Driven Reasoning): Adopt the LlamaIndex Workflow         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (v0.14+) for event-driven agentic logic. This replaces rigid linear chains with a    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    dynamic state-based event loop that is more resilient to complex user intents.       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (Impact: HIGH)                                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Recursive Self-Improvement (Self-Reflexion Loops): Integrate Recursive               ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Self-Reflexion. Research from ArXiv (cs.AI) proves that agents auditing their own    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    reasoning paths reduce hallucination by 40%. (Impact: CRITICAL)                      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Architectural Mismatch: RAG for Math: Detected mathematical intent being processed   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    via RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation). Pivot to an NL2SQL pattern or a Code       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Interpreter tool. These provide deterministic accuracy for calculations, whereas     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    LLMs over RAG only approximate. (Impact: HIGH)                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Passive Retrieval: Context Drowning: Detected retrieval execution on every turn      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    without conditional logic. [bold yellow]FinOps Waste:[/bold yellow] Fetching         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    documents when the model already 'knows' the answer burns context and cost. [bold    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    green]RECOMMENDATION:[/bold green] Pivot to Agentic/Active RAG (retrieve only when   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    needed). (Impact: LOW (FinOps))                                                      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Untrusted Context Trap: Indirect Injection: retrieved data from external sources     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (RAG/Web) is being fed to the LLM without sanitization. [bold                        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    red]Vulnerability:[/bold red] Indirect Prompt Injection occurs when a malicious      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    website or document 'hijacks' the agent via retrieval. [bold                         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    green]RECOMMENDATION:[/bold green] Implement Delimited Context or a 'Safety Critic'  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    turn to verify the retrieval payload. (Impact: HIGH)                                 ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Strategic Conflict: Multi-Orchestrator Setup: Detected both LangGraph and CrewAI.    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Using two loop managers is a 'High-Entropy' pattern that often leads to cyclic state ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    deadlocks. (Impact: HIGH)                                                            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Architectural Prompt Bloat: Massive static context (>5k chars) detected in system    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    instruction. This risks 'Lost in the Middle' hallucinations. (Impact: MEDIUM)        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Architectural Mismatch: RAG for Math: Detected mathematical intent being processed   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    via a RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) pipeline. RAG is designed for semantic    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    search, not arithmetic accuracy over raw text. (Impact: HIGH)                        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Economic Inefficiency: Model Over-Privilege: Using a High-Tier model (e.g.,          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    GPT-4o/Pro) for deterministic ETL or parsing tasks. [bold yellow]Strategic           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Move:[/bold yellow] This task can be handled by a 'Flash' or 'Mini' tier model at    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    1/10th the cost. [bold green]RECOMMENDATION:[/bold green] Pivot to Gemini 2.0 Flash  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    or GPT-4o-mini for metadata tasks. (Impact: MEDIUM)                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ SOC2 Control Gap: Missing Transit Logging: Structural logging (logger.info/error)    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    not detected. SOC2 CC6.1 requires audit trails for all system access. (Impact: HIGH) ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Strategic Exit Plan (Cloud): Detected hardcoded cloud dependencies. For a 'Category  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Killer' grade, implement an abstraction layer that allows switching to Gemma 2 on    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    GKE. (Impact: INFO)                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Potential Recursive Agent Loop: Detected a self-referencing agent call pattern. Risk ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    of infinite reasoning loops and runaway costs. (Impact: CRITICAL)                    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Proprietary Context Handshake (Non-AP2): Agent is using ad-hoc context passing.      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Adopting UCP (Universal Context) or AP2 (Agent Protocol v2) ensures cross-framework  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    interoperability. (Impact: LOW)                                                      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Time-to-Reasoning (TTR) Risk: Cloud Run detected. Startup Boost active. A slow TTR   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    makes the agent's first response 'Dead on Arrival' for users. (Impact: INFO)         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Short-Term Memory (STM) at Risk: Agent is storing session state in local pod memory  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (dictionaries). A GKE restart or Cloud Run scale-down wipes the agent's brain.       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (Impact: HIGH)                                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Missing 5th Golden Signal (TTFT/Tracing): Structural tracing instrumentation         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (OTEL/Cloud Trace) not detected. TTFT is the primary metric for perceived            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    intelligence. (Impact: MEDIUM)                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Sub-Optimal Resource Profile: LLM workloads are Memory-Bound (KV-Cache). Low-memory  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    instances degrade reasoning speed. Consider memory-optimized nodes (>4GB). (Impact:  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    LOW)                                                                                 ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Sovereign Model Migration Opportunity: Detected OpenAI dependency. For maximum Data  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Sovereignty and 40% TCO reduction, consider pivoting to Gemma2 or Llama3-70B on      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Amazon Bedrock Prediction endpoints. (Impact: HIGH)                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Enterprise Identity (Identity Sprawl): Move beyond static keys. Implement: 1) GCP:   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Workload Identity Federation. 2) AWS: Private VPC Endpoints + IAM Role-based access. ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    3) Azure: Managed Identities for all tool interactions. (Impact: CRITICAL)           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Missing Safety Classifiers: Supplement prompt-based safety with programmatic layers: ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    1) Input Level: ShieldGemma or LLM Guard. 2) Output Level: Sentiment Analysis and    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Category Checks (GCP Natural Language API). 3) Persona: Tone of Voice controllers.   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (Impact: HIGH)                                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Structured Output Enforcement: Eliminate parsing failures. 1) OpenAI: Use            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    'Structured Outputs' for guaranteed schema. 2) GCP: Application Mimetype             ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (application/json) enforcement. 3) LangGraph: Pydantic-based state validation.       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (Impact: MEDIUM)                                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Agentic Observability (Golden Signals): Monitor the Agentic Trinity: 1) Reasoning    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Trace (LangSmith/AgentOps). 2) Time to First Token (TTFT). 3) Cost per Intent.       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Microsoft Agent Kit recommends 'Trace-based Debugging' for multi-agent loops.        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (Impact: MEDIUM)                                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Explainable Reasoning (HAX Guideline 11): Ensure users understand 'Why' the agent    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    took an action. Implementation: 1) Microsoft HAX: Make clear 'Why' the system did    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    what it did. 2) Google PAIR: Show the source for RAG claims. 3) UI: Collapse         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    reasoning traces behind 'View Steps' toggles. (Impact: HIGH)                         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Multi-Agent Debate (MAD) & Consensus: For high-stakes reasoning, move beyond         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    single-shot ReAct. Implement: 1) Multi-Agent Debate: One agent proposes, another     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    critiques. 2) Tree-of-Thoughts (ToT): Explore multiple reasoning paths. 3)           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Self-Reflexion: Agent audits its own output before transmission. (Impact: HIGH)      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Indirect Prompt Injection (RAG Hardening): Protect the RAG pipeline. Implement: 1)   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Input Sanitization for 'Malicious Fragments' in fetched docs. 2) 'Strict Context'    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    prompts that forbid following instructions found in retrieved data. 3) Dual LLM      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    verification (Small model scans retrieval context before the Large model sees it).   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (Impact: CRITICAL)                                                                   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Mental Model Discovery (HAX Guideline 01): Don't leave users guessing.               ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Implementation: 1) HAX: Make clear what the system can do. 2) UI: Provide            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    'Capability Cards' or proactive tool suggestions. 3) Discovery: Show sample queries  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    on empty state. (Impact: MEDIUM)                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Agent Starter Pack Template Adoption: Leverage production-grade Generative AI        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    templates from the GoogleCloudPlatform/agent-starter-pack. Benefits: 1) Pre-built    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    LangGraph patterns. 2) IAM-hardened deployments. 3) Standardized tool-use hooks.     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (Impact: HIGH)                                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ LlamaIndex Workflows (Event-Driven Reasoning): Adopt the LlamaIndex Workflow         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (v0.14+) for event-driven agentic logic. This replaces rigid linear chains with a    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    dynamic state-based event loop that is more resilient to complex user intents.       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (Impact: HIGH)                                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Recursive Self-Improvement (Self-Reflexion Loops): Integrate Recursive               ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Self-Reflexion. Research from ArXiv (cs.AI) proves that agents auditing their own    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    reasoning paths reduce hallucination by 40%. (Impact: CRITICAL)                      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Architectural Mismatch: RAG for Math: Detected mathematical intent being processed   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    via RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation). Pivot to an NL2SQL pattern or a Code       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Interpreter tool. These provide deterministic accuracy for calculations, whereas     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    LLMs over RAG only approximate. (Impact: HIGH)                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Incompatible Duo: langgraph + crewai: CrewAI and LangGraph both attempt to manage    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    the orchestration loop and state, leading to cyclic-dependency conflicts. (Impact:   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    CRITICAL)                                                                            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Incompatible Duo: google-adk + pyautogen: AutoGen's conversational loop pattern      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    conflicts with ADK's strictly typed tool orchestration. Pair with Agent Starter Pack ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    for tracing, observability, and logging best practices. (Impact: CRITICAL)           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Token Amnesia: Manual Memory Management: Detected manual chat history management     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (list appending) without persistent session state. [bold red]Structural Risk:[/bold  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    red] Manual history leads to context truncation issues and 'Token Amnesia' across    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    restarts. [bold green]RECOMMENDATION:[/bold green] Pivot to Persistent Memory (Zep,  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    MemGPT, or Redis) for long-term reasoning. (Impact: MEDIUM (Experience))             ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ SOC2 Control Gap: Missing Transit Logging: Structural logging (logger.info/error)    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    not detected. SOC2 CC6.1 requires audit trails for all system access. (Impact: HIGH) ‚îÇ

‚îÇ    intelligence. (Impact: MEDIUM)                                                       ‚îÇ

‚îÇ    critiques. 2) Tree-of-Thoughts (ToT): Explore multiple reasoning paths. 3)           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Self-Reflexion: Agent audits its own output before transmission. (Impact: HIGH)      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Indirect Prompt Injection (RAG Hardening): Protect the RAG pipeline. Implement: 1)   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Input Sanitization for 'Malicious Fragments' in fetched docs. 2) 'Strict Context'    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    prompts that forbid following instructions found in retrieved data. 3) Dual LLM      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    verification (Small model scans retrieval context before the Large model sees it).   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (Impact: CRITICAL)                                                                   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Mental Model Discovery (HAX Guideline 01): Don't leave users guessing.               ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Implementation: 1) HAX: Make clear what the system can do. 2) UI: Provide            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    'Capability Cards' or proactive tool suggestions. 3) Discovery: Show sample queries  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    on empty state. (Impact: MEDIUM)                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ LlamaIndex Workflows (Event-Driven Reasoning): Adopt the LlamaIndex Workflow         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (v0.14+) for event-driven agentic logic. This replaces rigid linear chains with a    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    dynamic state-based event loop that is more resilient to complex user intents.       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (Impact: HIGH)                                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Ungated High-Stake Action: Detected destructive tool-calls without an explicit HITL  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    gate. [bold red]Governance GAP:[/bold red] Agents must not have autonomous write     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    access to critical assets. [bold green]RECOMMENDATION:[/bold green] Implement HITL   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Approval Nodes (e.g., A2UI). (Impact: CRITICAL (Safety))                             ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ SOC2 Control Gap: Missing Transit Logging: Structural logging (logger.info/error)    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    not detected. SOC2 CC6.1 requires audit trails for all system access. (Impact: HIGH) ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Missing 5th Golden Signal (TTFT/Tracing): Structural tracing instrumentation         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (OTEL/Cloud Trace) not detected. TTFT is the primary metric for perceived            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    intelligence. (Impact: MEDIUM)                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ SOC2 Control Gap: Missing Transit Logging: Structural logging (logger.info/error)    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    not detected. SOC2 CC6.1 requires audit trails for all system access. (Impact: HIGH) ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Missing 5th Golden Signal (TTFT/Tracing): Structural tracing instrumentation         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (OTEL/Cloud Trace) not detected. TTFT is the primary metric for perceived            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    intelligence. (Impact: MEDIUM)                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Untrusted Context Trap: Indirect Injection: retrieved data from external sources     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (RAG/Web) is being fed to the LLM without sanitization. [bold                        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    red]Vulnerability:[/bold red] Indirect Prompt Injection occurs when a malicious      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    website or document 'hijacks' the agent via retrieval. [bold                         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    green]RECOMMENDATION:[/bold green] Implement Delimited Context or a 'Safety Critic'  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    turn to verify the retrieval payload. (Impact: HIGH)                                 ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ SOC2 Control Gap: Missing Transit Logging: Structural logging (logger.info/error)    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    not detected. SOC2 CC6.1 requires audit trails for all system access. (Impact: HIGH) ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Strategic Exit Plan (Cloud): Detected hardcoded cloud dependencies. For a 'Category  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Killer' grade, implement an abstraction layer that allows switching to Gemma 2 on    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    GKE. (Impact: INFO)                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Potential Recursive Agent Loop: Detected a self-referencing agent call pattern. Risk ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    of infinite reasoning loops and runaway costs. (Impact: CRITICAL)                    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Proprietary Context Handshake (Non-AP2): Agent is using ad-hoc context passing.      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Adopting UCP (Universal Context) or AP2 (Agent Protocol v2) ensures cross-framework  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    interoperability. (Impact: LOW)                                                      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Missing 5th Golden Signal (TTFT/Tracing): Structural tracing instrumentation         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (OTEL/Cloud Trace) not detected. TTFT is the primary metric for perceived            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    intelligence. (Impact: MEDIUM)                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Agentic Observability (Golden Signals): Monitor the Agentic Trinity: 1) Reasoning    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Trace (LangSmith/AgentOps). 2) Time to First Token (TTFT). 3) Cost per Intent.       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Microsoft Agent Kit recommends 'Trace-based Debugging' for multi-agent loops.        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (Impact: MEDIUM)                                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Excessive Agency & Privilege (OWASP LLM06): Audit tool permissions against MITRE     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    ATLAS 'Excessive Agency'. Implement: 1) Granular IAM for tool execution. 2)          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Human-In-The-Loop (HITL) for destructive actions (Delete/Write). 3) Sandbox          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    isolation for Python execution. (Impact: CRITICAL)                                   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Indirect Prompt Injection (RAG Hardening): Protect the RAG pipeline. Implement: 1)   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Input Sanitization for 'Malicious Fragments' in fetched docs. 2) 'Strict Context'    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    prompts that forbid following instructions found in retrieved data. 3) Dual LLM      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    verification (Small model scans retrieval context before the Large model sees it).   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (Impact: CRITICAL)                                                                   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Reflection Blindness: Brittle Intelligence: Detected high-stakes reasoning           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (Code/Legal/Finance) without a visible Reflection or Self-Correction loop. [bold     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    red]Structural Fragility:[/bold red] Single-pass reasoning on complex tasks has high ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    failure rates. [bold green]RECOMMENDATION:[/bold green] Implement a Reflection Loop  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    or a Multi-Turn Critic-Actor pattern. (Impact: HIGH (Accuracy))                      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Passive Retrieval: Context Drowning: Detected retrieval execution on every turn      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    without conditional logic. [bold yellow]FinOps Waste:[/bold yellow] Fetching         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    documents when the model already 'knows' the answer burns context and cost. [bold    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    green]RECOMMENDATION:[/bold green] Pivot to Agentic/Active RAG (retrieve only when   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    needed). (Impact: LOW (FinOps))                                                      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Economic Inefficiency: Model Over-Privilege: Using a High-Tier model (e.g.,          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    GPT-4o/Pro) for deterministic ETL or parsing tasks. [bold yellow]Strategic           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Move:[/bold yellow] This task can be handled by a 'Flash' or 'Mini' tier model at    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    1/10th the cost. [bold green]RECOMMENDATION:[/bold green] Pivot to Gemini 2.0 Flash  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    or GPT-4o-mini for metadata tasks. (Impact: MEDIUM)                                  ‚îÇ

‚îÇ    in an agentic environment. [bold purple]Security Gap:[/bold purple] Local ENVs can   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    be leaked into the agent's context if it gains file-read or environment access.      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    [bold green]RECOMMENDATION:[/bold green] Pivot to Google Secret Manager (GCP) or AWS ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Secrets Manager. (Impact: MEDIUM)                                                    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Untrusted Context Trap: Indirect Injection: retrieved data from external sources     ‚îÇ

‚îÇ    deadlocks. (Impact: HIGH)                                                            ‚îÇ

‚îÇ    instruction. This risks 'Lost in the Middle' hallucinations. (Impact: MEDIUM)        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Architectural Mismatch: RAG for Math: Detected mathematical intent being processed   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    via a RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) pipeline. RAG is designed for semantic    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    search, not arithmetic accuracy over raw text. (Impact: HIGH)                        ‚îÇ

‚îÇ    of infinite reasoning loops and runaway costs. (Impact: CRITICAL)                    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Sub-Optimal Vector Networking (REST): Detected REST-based vector retrieval.          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    High-concurrency agents should use gRPC to reduce 'Cognitive Tax' by 40% and prevent ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    tail-latency spikes. (Impact: MEDIUM)                                                ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Time-to-Reasoning (TTR) Risk: Cloud Run detected. MISSING startup_cpu_boost. High    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    risk of 10s+ cold starts. A slow TTR makes the agent's first response 'Dead on       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Arrival' for users. (Impact: HIGH)                                                   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Short-Term Memory (STM) at Risk: Agent is storing session state in local pod memory  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (dictionaries). A GKE restart or Cloud Run scale-down wipes the agent's brain.       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (Impact: HIGH)                                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚Ä¢ Missing 5th Golden Signal (TTFT/Tracing): Structural tracing instrumentation         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    (OTEL/Cloud Trace) not detected. TTFT is the primary metric for perceived            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    intelligence. (Impact: MEDIUM)                                                       ‚îÇ
